questions.text: Where was John Crichton at in the opening scene of the series?
questions.explanation:
On a beach.

	He was leaning up against his car on the beach, with the rocket he was about to take off on the next day in the background. The next scene was him in a laboratory getting ready to launch into space.

questions.text: What happened to Crichton and his shuttle during the experiment?
questions.correct: He went through a wormhole to parts unknown.
options: The experiment went fine, nothing happened.
He went so fast he travelled forward in time.
questions.explanation:
He went through a wormhole to parts unknown.

	The shuttle was designed by Crichton and his friend. They were trying to prove their own theory about space travel. the ship named Farscape 1.

questions.text: What was the name of the ship that Crichton and his new friends stole?
questions.explanation:
Moya.

	Moya was a living ship and had a pilot simply named pilot. Crichton's shuttle landed on the ship while his soon to be friends freed Moya from captivity while escaping prison.

questions.text: Who was the captain of the Peacekeeper ship that Crichton and friends escaped from?
questions.explanation:
Bialar Crais.

	Crais was played by Lani Tupu. Crichton had crashed into a ship that was piloted by Crais' brother as he jumped through the wormhole. Because of that Crais forced his crew to hunt down the Moya and its occupants.

questions.text: Zotoh Zhaan was a priest on her home world, what did Ka D'Argo do?
questions.explanation:
Warrior.

	Zotoh Zhaan was a priest who was know to be an anarchist, that's why she was imprisoned. D'Argo was a warrior who was locked up because he killed a fellow warrior. Zhaan was played by Virginia Hey, D'Argo by Anthony Simcoe.

questions.text: Who was the Peacekeeper officer who was captured on the Moya?
questions.explanation:
Aeryn Sun.

	Aeryn Sun was a female member of the Peacekeepers. She was played by Claudia Black. She was captured by the Moya crew during their escape. Crichton and Sun were locked up by the others at first. That changed after she attacked him once she woke up. Crichton and Sun both eventually joined with Moya, Pilot, Zhaan, Rigel XVI and D'Argo. Each creature was from a different species.

questions.text: Which of the original escapees was recaptured on the first planet the Moya stopped on?
questions.explanation:
Ka D'Argo.

	Pilot is linked to Moya and could not leave the ship. Sun and Crichton weren't among the original group of escapees, so the only option that was eligible was D'Argo. They escaped again while on the way to a jail and returned to Moya, escaping just in time avoid being captured or killed by the Peacekeepers.

Ben Browder.

	Browder played Crichton in each of the 88 episodes and the mini series that wrapped up the story. When "Farscape" was over, he joined "Stargate: SG-1" as a main character, and was later joined by co-star Claudia Black on that show as well.

questions.text: Despite figuring out how to create a wormhole back home, Crichton decided to stay with the Moya crew to explore the universe.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The exact opposite is true. He was forced to settle into life on the ship because he couldn't find a way to return to Earth. Instead he uses his skills to earn his place on the ship.

questions.text: The Moya escaped into the Unchartered Territories.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The ship did escape into the Unchartered Territories, where the Peacekeepers had no official jurisdiction, though the ship and it's crew were not safe. Aeryn Sun pointed out to them all that Bialar Crais would not let that stand in the way of capturing them if he possibly could.
